name: PumpkinSoup
description:
This is an entry to 1st flamejam 2021. You can play it here:

https://sharyari.github.io/flamejam2021/

Eat pumpkins, don't eat poison.

Eating pumpkins with hats makes the joystick controls reverse for 5s. This could be perceived as a "twist".

Github:

https://github.com/sharyari/flamejam2021
